steps.content: The main part of the page comprises the list of dataflows which you have access to – ‘My dataflows’
A dataflow. On the dataflow card, you can see various metadata – Your role; Delivery date; Dataflow name; Dataflow description; Associated obligation and instrument; Status
Filters and sort on the various metadata of the dataflows list allow you to find things easily in the dataflows list
This button will expand the menu, to show the icon labels
The static menu is available on every page and has four buttons. From top to button, the buttons are
